name: clusterws-client-js
description: JavaScript Client for ClusterWS - is a minimal Node JS http & real-time framework which allows to scale WebSocket (uWS - one of the fastest WebSocket libraries) between Node JS Clusters and utilize all available CPU.
author: Dmitrii Goriunov <goriunovd@gmail.com>

scripts.build:prod: cross-env WEBPACK_ENV=min webpack  --config ./.builder/webpack.config.js && cross-env WEBPACK_ENV=notmin webpack --config ./.builder/webpack.config.js && webpack  --config ./.builder/webpack.config.js
scripts.publish: npm run build:prod && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
